text: We are so lucky @UWaterloo to have the expertise of @UWPharmacy prof Kelly Grindrod @kgrindrod, and I'm delighted she joined me on #BeyondtheBulletinPodcast to clear up some misperceptions about the #COVID19 #vaccine and getting the shot. Listen in. https://t.co/CRJGT9RdFD https://t.co/0cCUrpZgXf
